title: Introduction Programing and Python
name: ../video/v1.mp4
detail: Python is a popular programming language. It was created by Guido van Rossum, and released in 1991. web development (server-side), software development, mathematics, system scripting.

title: Modules, Comments & Pip
name: ../video/v2.mp4
detail: Comments can be used to explain Python code. Comments can be used to make the code more readable. Comments can be used to prevent execution when testing code.

title: Comment, escape Sequences, String
name: ../video/v3.mp4
detail: Strings in python are surrounded by either single quotation marks, or double quotation marks. 'hello' is the same as 'hello'.

title: Prectice Set 1
name: ../video/v4.mp4
detail:
(1) Python program to interchange first and last elements in a list.
(2) Python program to swap two elements in a list.

title: Lists & Tuples
name: ../video/v5.mp4
detail: Lists are used to store multiple items in a single variable. Lists are one of 4 built-in data types in Python used to store collections of data, the other 3 are Tuple, Set, and Dictionary.

title: Variable and Data Types
name: ../video/v1.mp4
detail: Variables are containers for storing data values.Python has no command for declaring a variable. A variable is created the moment you first assign a value to it.

title: User Inputs and Opearator
name: ../video/v2.mp4
detail: Python divides the operators (1) Arithmetic operators , (2) Assignment operators , (3) Comparison operators , (4) Logical operators , (5) Identity operators , (6) Membership operators , (7) Bitwise operators

title: If...Else Conditional Statement and Switch case
name: ../video/v3.mp4
detail: These conditions can be used in several ways, most commonly in 'if statements' and loops. An 'if statement' is written by using the if keyword.

title: Loops in Python
name: ../video/v4.mp4
detail: Python Support while and for loop. A for loop is used for iterating over a sequence (that is either a list, a tuple, a dictionary, a set, or a string).This is less like the for keyword in other programming languages.

title: Break and Continue
name: ../video/v5.mp4
detail: break statement in Python is used to bring the control out of the loop when some external condition is triggered. break statement is put inside the loop body (generally after if condition).

title: Prectice Set 2
name: ../video/v1.mp4
detail:
(1) Python program to check whether the string is Symmetrical or Palindrome.
(2) Reverse words in a given String in Python

title: Functions & Recursion
name: ../video/v2.mp4
detail: A function is a block of code which only runs when it is called. You can pass data, known as parameters, into a function. A function can return data as a result.

title: Set Method In Python
name: ../video/v3.mp4
detail: A Set in Python is a collection of unique elements which are unordered and mutable. Python provides various functions to work with Set.

title: Object Oriented Programming
name: ../video/v4.mp4
detail: In Python, object-oriented Programming (OOPs) is a programming paradigm that uses objects and classes in programming. It aims to implement real-world entities like inheritance, polymorphisms, encapsulation, etc.

title: Inheritance
name: ../video/v5.mp4
detail: Inheritance allows us to define a class that inherits all the methods and properties from another class. Parent class is the class being inherited from, also called base class. Child class is the class that inherits from another class, also called derived class.

title: Dictionaries and Diction Method
name: ../video/v1.mp4
detail: Dictionary in Python is a collection of keys values, used to store data values like a map, which, unlike other data types which hold only a single value as an element.

title: Prectice Set 3
name: ../video/v2.mp4
detail:
(1) Python program to Find the size of a Tuple.
(2) Python - Maximum and Minimum K elements in Tuple.

title: Snake, Water, Gun Game
name: ../video/v3.mp4
detail: Snake Water Gun is one of the famous two-player game played by many people. It is a hand game in which the player randomly chooses any of the three forms i.e. snake, water, and gun. Here, we are going to implement this game using python.
